column4: Is this the correct place to ask for help with installing a proprietary graphics card driver? (It's an ATI card.)
I'm not sure. glxinfo says there's no direct rendering
did you run sudo aticonfig --initial then sudo aticonfig --overlay-type=Xv
can you post your xorg to pastebin pls
what does glxinfo | grep "direct rendering" return?
apologies but can you try to reinstall the driver with the envy script (IMPORTANT - use envy to remove the old driver first)
no for both installs direct from nvidia/ati
Thanks, I'll give it a shot.
np remember to remove first tho
good luck hope it works. if it all gets really sour an nowone here can help you can reach me at al1b1.watch.it@gmail.com
